channel.title: The Story of Egmo
channel.itunes:author: Ben Cormack
channel.description: Scholar, gent, athlete, and raconteur, not to mention internationally renowned model Egmo is none of these, unless by scholar you mean moron, and by model you refer to a squat dandruff producing unit coated in a smattering of sweat and a selection of interesting greases. But in the green and pleasant Pingooland he's all that stands between utopia and chaos as the evil overlord Krapodkin strives to enslave the nation and wreak sweet revenge on the people who never let him run through the fields naked and free... or something. The Story of Egmo is the critically acclaimed debut audiobook from renowned cartoonist Ben Cormack. Its the worlds favorite completely free comedy book!
channel.itunes:subtitle: The Story of Egmo is the critically acclaimed debut audiobook from renowned cartoonist Ben Cormack. Its the worlds favorite completely free comedy book!

item.title: Chapter 01
item.itunes:author: Ben Cormack
